title: Data Analysis Education Based on Corporate Financial Risk Warning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Optimized Content Delivery for Smartphone-Based Learning Environments, Featuring Visual Aids and Case-Centered Instructional Design

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of a knowledge graph-based financial risk prediction model.
Learners can apply methods to enhance financial risk prediction accuracy through the optimization process of the STDE-FG model.
Learners can identify risk signals by analyzing real corporate financial data provided in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
